mapper.insert: insert into pbjl (pDate, btime1, btime2, btime3, btime4, weekDays, timeState1,timeState2,timeState3,timeState4, id) values (#{pdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btime1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btime2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btime3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{btime4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weekDays},#{timeState1},#{timeState2},#{timeState3},#{timeState4},#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from pbjl where pDate BETWEEN #{dtDate_Start} and #{dtDate_End} and id=#{id}
